0 CLS:DIMT,S(6),K(255),D(6),C(6),T(6),R(2),S$(2),S,M$:GOTO1000
1 D(T)=D(T)*-1:POKES(T),83:IFPEEK(S(T)+32)<>143THEN21
2 POKES(T),143:S(T)=S(T)+32:POKES(T),83:IFPEEK(S(T)+32)=143THEN2
3 IFPEEK(S(T)+32)=88THENPOKES(T),143:S(T)=S(T)+32:POKES(T),83:GOTO99
4 POKES(T),64:SOUND9,1:D(T)=0:C(T)=64:T(T)=L:GOTO21
5 IFD(T)THEN1
6 T(T)=T(T)-1:IFT(T)THEN21
7 IFPEEK(S(T)-1)=32ANDPEEK(S(T)+1)=32THENT(T)=T(T)+L:POKES(T),143:S(T)=S(T)+32:POKES(T),64:SOUND100,2:GOTO21
8 POKES(T),83:D(T)=R(RND(2)):C(T)=143:IFS(T)<16864THEN21
9 PRINT@0,"BASE CAPTURED!  TRY AGAIN (Y/N)?";:GOTO100
10 POKEP,143:ONK(PEEK(P-1))GOTO11,99,18,70,18,18,18,18,18,18
11 P=P-1:GOTO18
12 POKEP,143:ONK(PEEK(P+1))GOTO13,99,18,71,18,18,18,18,18,18
13 P=P+1:GOTO18
14 POKEP,143:ONK(PEEK(P-32))GOTO15,99,18,72,18,18,18,18,18,18
15 P=P-32:GOTO18
16 POKEP,143:ONK(PEEK(P+32))GOTO17,99,18,73,18,18,18,18,18,18
17 P=P+32:GOTO18
18 POKEP,89:S=S*-1:M$=S$(S+1):GOSUB19:POKEP,88:RETURN
19 B1=USR(VARPTR(M$)):RETURN
20 FORT=1TO6:POKES(T),C(T):ONK(PEEK(S(T)+D(T)))GOTO1,1,1,5,99:S(T)=S(T)+D(T):POKES(T),83:IFPEEK(S(T)+32)=143THEN2
21 ONK(PEEK(2)ANDPEEK(17023))GOSUB10,12,14,16:NEXT:GOTO20
70 P=P-1:POKEP,79:SOUND200,5:GOTO75
71 P=P+1:POKEP,79:SOUND200,5:GOTO75
72 P=P-32:POKEP,79:SOUND200,5:GOTO75
73 P=P+32:POKEP,79:SOUND200,5:GOTO75
75 FORZ=1TO6:IFS(Z)=PTHENS(Z)=16384+Z*3:Z=6
76 NEXT
77 SC=SC+10:PRINT@480,"SCORE"SC;:GOTO18
99 POKEP,191:PRINT@0,"YOU'RE DEAD!    TRY AGAIN (Y/N)?";
100 M$=INKEY$:IFM$=""THEN100
110 IFM$="Y"THEN150
120 IFM$="N"THENEND
130 GOTO100
150 IFSC>HSTHENHS=SC
200 CLS1:FORT=16416TO16863:POKET,32:NEXT:POKE16384,42:POKE16415,42
210 FORT=6*32+16TO480STEP32:PRINT@T,A$;:NEXT
220 FORT=6*32+1TO6*32+30:PRINT@T,A$;:NEXT:POKE16879,42:POKE16881,42
230 FORT=1TO6:PRINT@32*T+3,A$;:PRINT@32*T+28,A$;:NEXT
240 FORT=1TO6:S(T)=16384+T*3:D(T)=R(RND(2)):C(T)=143:NEXT:P=16880:POKEP,88
250 SC=0:L=10:PRINT@480,"SCORE"SC;:PRINT@480+18,"HIGH"HS;:GOTO20
1000 GOSUB7100:FORT=0TO255:K(T)=9:NEXT
1005 K(32)=1:K(83)=2:K(42)=3:K(64)=4:K(88)=5:K(143)=0
1010 A$=CHR$(143):R(1)=-1:R(2)=1
1020 K(65)=1:K(83)=2:K(87)=3:K(90)=4:K(88)=5:K(67)=6:F=49151
1030 S$(0)="/2":S$(2)="+/2":S=1
1090 GOTO200
